OrgName: Subway Franchisee Advertising Fund Trust, Ltd.
activities: SFAFT operates as the advertising part of the SUBWAY® Group’s advertising entities, which includes, but is not limited to: Subway Franchisee Advertising Fund Trust, Ltd. (“SFAFT”) a Connecticut statutory trust,and Subway Franchisee Advertising Fund Trust, B.V. (“SFAFT BV”) is a Netherlands limited liability company. SFAFT provides its affiliates with certain services, including but not limited to franchise marketing.  SFAFT receives personal information from its Netherlands affiliate, SFAFT BV, the SUBWAY® Group development agents throughout Europe regarding SUBWAY® Group franchisees, in order to service their marketing needs, as well as receiving personal information from SUBWAY® Restaurant customers in order to provide customer service.
contactoff1: Subway Franchisee Advertising Fund Trust, Ltd.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data regarding franchisee marketing needs and customer complaints.
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
